クラス NCMBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nifcloud.mbaas.core.NCMBConnection

  • public class NCMBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    NCMBConnection is a class that communicates with NIFCLOUD mobile backend

      • sendRequest

        public NCMBResponse sendRequest()
                         throws NCMBException
        Request NIFCLOUD mobile backed api synchronously
        戻り値:
        result object from NIFCLOUD mobile backend
        例外:
        NCMBException - exception from NIFCLOUD mobile backend

        パラメータ:
